entry.title: Sync Desktop Folder With Dropbox
entry.content:
I put all work-related files in my dropbox folder to back up all my files. Like some people, I also like to put ongoing-project files on my computer desktop. One day, I want to back up all my desktop files to my dropbox folder. Found a article on line. Just need to type a command line in terminal:

ln -s /path/to/desired-folder ~/Dropbox/desired-folder
